body.end: for discord. Everything in the website can be done with this discord bot through discord without leaving discord

table_rows.;gif [text=None]: Send a random Cat GIF. If a text is given, the given text will be added onto the image.
table_rows.;cat [text=None]: Send a random Cat image. If a text is given, the given text will be added onto the image.
table_rows.;filter [filter_name='sepia'] [text=None: Send a a random Cat Image with a filter overlayed on it. filter_name can have one of these six values: blur, mono, sepia, negative, paint, pixel. Defaults to sepia. If a text is given, the given text will be added onto the image.
table_rows.;filtergif [filter_name='sepia'] [text=N: Send a a random Cat GIF with a filter overlayed on it. filter_name can have one of these six values: blur, mono, sepia, negative, paint, pixel. Defaults to sepia. If a text is given, the given text will be added onto the image.
table_rows.;breed: Send a randomly selected cat breed
table_rows.;cats [count=1]: Send a specified amount of Cat Images one by one. count defaults to 1. The count should always be less than 20 by default.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.sub_title: A list of common questions about this Discord Bot

What is the bot prefix?: The prefix of this discord bot is ;
